title: Is ZED Ok??!!!!!
body:
rito what are u planning for  zed???????
yesterday i opened the league site and when i went to zed champ info i found this weird animation and this video and  idk but this video really shows that he isnt ok 
so i opened youtube and searched for it 
i watched a video for redmercy https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=khEK1CSeAio
and in the comments he said that someone made an interesting tweet https://twitter.com/vahezakaryan201/status/680907395816493056
and i noticed that everyone is saying that someone called deadeye who did this to zed 
so i opened the forms and searched and i found something really interesting http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=769230
and its made by a senior member in 23-5-2011
just wanted to share this info with u guys.
and if u guys have and ideas about what this could be or any info   plz lemme know in a comment

replies.body:
You missed out a lot. Let me fill you in:

1. If you search that file for "Jhin", you'll find folder paths to _/workspaces/Jhin/Jhin Promo Layback.prproj_

 Which indicated that Riot has created a new folder for a champion, like they have for all the others. It's likely that The Deadeye is his title, and that he will be an ADC like in the forum post you linked.

2. On Zed's champion page there is a gif that looks like this 
 http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-xF9mk5f_H-s/Vn8ZFo4HZrI/AAAAAAAA2Us/KD60CMELA_w/s1600/Zed.gif

 Now Sona, Vi and Garen have been leaked, which confirms the twitter post.
 http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-k8nRsMm7pcY/VoGFltMg41I/AAAAAAAA2Wg/k3erR3DN6Nk/s1600/qG7WvNE%2B-%2BImgur.gif
 http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-we3HC-JgMVI/VoGFlmcOnZI/AAAAAAAA2Wk/VlG2kR04IiE/s1600/1KnImqP%2B-%2BImgur.gif
 http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-oU-h_fRSMHA/VoGFlR650dI/AAAAAAAA2Wc/HRLPM9m0Txg/s1600/KpxJ32P%2B-%2BImgur.gif
I feel like Maraudaur is just sitting there watching this all unfold and laughing at how terribly lost we are
Hey I have another theory! http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/AU139hNi-jhin-theory-not-what-many-may-think I still think guns are involved though :D

Hmmmmm
Maraudaur posted a comment
Hmmmmmmmmmmmm .___.

The fact a Rioter is posting here leads me to believe either A. Someone is on the right track, or B. totally way wayyy off. But since both the teasers have a gun shot... I'm going to say right track unless someone is a total troll in the audio department at Riot lol

thanks m8
i really appreciate it :D

inb4 next champ is a true-to-life Sniper adc, with an ultimate that slows everyone in a vicinity, and the camera zooms into first-person, so you can snipe enemies like a first-person shooter game- headshots deal true damage, legshots slow or stun, armshots silence, etc.

Jhin - Deadeye

Jhin the champ. Deadeye the champion title.
